panels.title: Pass Rate
panels.description: Percentage of datapoints sent vs received (sent/received * 100)

panels.title: PRW Bytes Rate
panels.description: PRW bytes per second by direction and compression state

panels.title: OTLP Bytes Rate
panels.description: OTLP bytes per second by direction and compression state

panels.title: Compression Ratio
panels.description: Ratio of compressed to uncompressed bytes (lower is better compression)

panels.title: Buffer Size
panels.description: Current buffer size by protocol (timeseries count)

panels.title: GC Pause Latency (percentiles)
panels.description: GC pause times by percentile. Lower is better.

panels.title: CPU Usage
panels.description: Process CPU usage rate (1 = 1 core fully utilized)

panels.title: Process Memory
panels.description: Process-level memory metrics from the OS perspective
